title: The Islamic Republic of Iran, Netanyahu's favorite enemy for 30 years
subhead: Since his rise to prominence on the Israeli political stage in the early 1990s, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has repeatedly insisted that the regime in Tehran poses an 'existential threat' to Israel.

US judge extends detention of pro-Palestinian protest leader Mahmoud Khalil
subhead: Khalil, a former NYU graduate student and one of the most visible leaders of nationwide campus protests against Israel's war in Gaza, was expected to be released after a US district judge issued the order on Wednesday, but is now being 'detained on another, second charge.'

title: In Ukraine, the Dnipropetrovsk region faces threats of a Russian breakthrough toward Pokrovsk
subhead: Moscow, which has aimed to seize the strategic city in the Donetsk region, declares to have crossed the administrative border âˆ’ a claim Kyiv denies.

title: 'Can robots beat the wolves of Wall Street?'
subhead: According to a study conducted by Stanford University, artificial intelligence has outperformed 93% of US equity mutual fund managers. So it is hardly surprising that the asset management industry is doubling down on technology, observes Isabelle Chaperon, economics reporter for Le Monde.
